publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-526.1 Tommy Sheridan: Building Better Cities - Delivering Growth and Opportunities-As an amendment to motion (S2M-526) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "believes that the regeneration of deprived inner city areas and addressing social inequality would be assisted by returning the power to raise business rates to local authorities and introducing an income-based local tax system to replace the regressive council tax."
